mainDescription: Text about who we are such a creative space we have a gallery where you can hang out and listen to music but our main area is the sale of paintings
orderDescription: Our studio will create paintings according to your order on the scale you need. We work with images in print, painting and graphic techniques.
picturesDescription: You can order a portrait in a modern style for yourself or loved ones.
reproductionsDescription: Reproductions of paintings by contemporary artists will become a stylish element of your interior and create a special, creative atmosphere in the room. It is also an original and pleasant gift for relatives and colleagues.
deliveryHeader--types: You can choose one of the following types of delivery:
deliveryDescription--box: You can pick up your order in the ARTÉ building at the following address: Moscow, V.O. 29th line, d 2, ticket office number 1 at the reception: daily from 10:00 to 20:30.
deliveryType--truck: Delivery of goods by courier (in Moscow)
deliveryDescription--truck: Courier delivery in Moscow within the Moscow Ring Road is usually carried out on the next business day after the order is sent to the courier. You will see the delivery cost when the order is formed. You can pay for delivery with the order.
deliveryType--airbus: Delivery of goods by courier (delivery in Russia and abroad)
deliveryDescription--airbus: We work with the transport companies EMS and TNT. Transport companies deliver the order to the door. Before delivery, they will contact you to determine the delivery time.
deliveryText--payment: ARTÉ works on 100% prepayment of the order. The term for the shipment of finished products is 1 business day. We deliver goods to anywhere in the world.
paymentHeader--cash: By cash or by credit card in a store (Moscow)
paymentText--cash: Payment is made at the address: Moscow, V.O., 29th line, d. 2, 1st floor; daily from 10:00 to 20:30.
paymentText--card: When paying by credit card, the card details are entered in the electronic payment system of PJSC AKB Avangard, which has been certified in Visa and MasterCard payment systems. The data you submitted is fully protected and no one, including our online store , can't get them.
deliveryAdditional: Across Russia and around the world
recallForm--header: Leave your contacts and we will call you back!
recallForm--description: We will talk about us and answer all your questions!
errorBlock--form: Please fill out all the required fields
